New Records: Virat Kohli scored 76 runs off 59 balls in the final to help India win the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 18 runs in 6 balls in the 18th over to turn the game in India's favor
Suryakumar Yadav made a game-saving catch to dismiss David Miller in the last over
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and decided to bat first
Virat Kohli was named Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma announced his retirement from T20Is after the win
Virat Kohli expressed relief and joy at finally winning the T20 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a historic win for India, their second T20 World Cup title after 17 years
The Proteas were dismissed for 169 runs in 20 overs
